description: Redevelopment of existing building (part Class C1, part Class E and part Sui Generis) through partial demolition of podium on ground floor and first floors and demolition of 16th and 17th storeys and plant at 18th floor; external alterations and extension of podium at ground and first floor levels for additional retail and restaurant floorspace; expanded hotel restaurant and retail use within the existing basement; basement extension to accommodate a substation; development of roof of podium level to provide a roof terrace and hotel bar; rebuild of 16th and 17th floors for new hotel accommodation, extension to provide residential accommodation (Class C3) at 18th to 21st floors; and associated works including plant, landscaping and other ancillary works. (MAJOR APPLICATION) (AFFECTING THE SETTING OF CONSERVATION AREAS, LISTED BUILDINGS AND LISTED PARKS)
locality: Royal Borough Of Kensington And Chelsea
